document.forum_title: Latest News on One News Page [United States] - Top Headlines and News Videos
document.discussion_title: Third Olympic Gold For US Mens Basketball Team
document.topic_text: Transcript: Third Olympic Gold For US Mens Basketball Team On Sunday, the United States men's basketball team beat out the Serbian team in the final game 96 to 66. The early moments of the game did have a few close calls. But overall the game was heavily weighed in favor of the American team. Star player Kevin Durante pushed the team to a victory by scoring 30 points by himself. United States player Mike Krzyzewsk had his final game but was able to get a third gold. Recent related news Anchoring the Jamaican men’s 4x100 relay team to victory, star sprinter Usain Bolt earned his third... Wall Street Journal
document.post: Transcript: Third Olympic Gold For US Mens Basketball Team On Sunday, the United States men's basketball team beat out the Serbian team in the final game 96 to 66. The early moments of the game did have a few close calls. But overall the game was heavily weighed in favor of the American team. Star player Kevin Durante pushed the team to a victory by scoring 30 points by himself. United States player Mike Krzyzewsk had his final game but was able to get a third gold.
